path_of_the_necromancer.description: It's a dark path to becoming a necromancer. Do you have what it takes? With these tools you should be able to streamline straight to it!

skeleton_summon.description: Them bones, them bones gonna walk around

boxling.description: A mysterious and magical race. Citizens of the Boxlings are an enchanted folk, using their magic to strengthen their allies and grow to great heights.
boxling.post_selection_description: , a proud and hard working race.

boxland.description: Large mountains, massive lakes and trees bearing fruit. The default home of the Boxlings.

necromancer_tome_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a Necromancer

necromancer_tome.description: Within lies the secrets to becoming a Necromancer

necromancer_description.description: Summon the undead to fight for you

level_0_data.perk_001_description: The necromancer has mastered the art of healing. Compassion greatly increased.
level_0_data.perk_002_description: The necromancer's presence greatly improves the muscle of those around them

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Them bones, them bones gonna walk around

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Glad these didn't cost a pound of flesh.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Skill with the sword has increased

botanist_outfit.description: The work clothes of a botanist.

botanist_magnify_glass.description: A botanist tool of the trade

botanist_workbench_ghost.description: The perfect place for a botanist to do their work.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Can make the most smallest, basic plants

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Botanist can now experiment with bushes, along with more sensitive plants

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Botanist can now experiment with trees, and plants that were out of reach seem simple now

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Botanist can now extract dyes. Trees, Bushes and the most sensitive plants are within reach

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The botanist has almost all the knowledge about flora in the area, can extract even the most difficult colors

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Botanist has mastered their craft. Can now extract pure essence from the hemp herb
